errors.error_description: The README suggests that `./start-dev.sh` installs requirements before creating the virtual environment, which is the wrong logical order.
correction_candidates: This will set up git hooks, create a virtual environment, and then install requirements.
Run `pip install -r requirements.txt` first, then run `./start-dev.sh`.
This will install system-wide requirements and then create a local virtual environment.
This will create a virtual environment, install requirements and set up git hooks.
errors.golden_answer: This will create a virtual environment, install requirements and set up git hooks.

errors.error_description: The command for running an experiment locally includes an incorrect flag `--config` which is not recognized by the script.
